content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am happy to discuss the rental price with you. May I ask how long you are planning to rent the apartment for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I will rent the apartment for one year.

Hi Mister Heine, I am Maria Mamani from Bolivia and I am interested in renting the apartment for one year. Can you tell me the current rental price?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, thank you for your interest in the apartment. The current rental price for a 25 square meter apartment in New York is 1,500 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I will rent the apartment for one year, so the monthly rental will be 18,000 Euros. I agree to the price of 18,000 Euros.

Hi Mister Heine, I am Maria Mamani from Bolivia and I am interested in renting the apartment for one year. The monthly rental will be 18,000 Euros. I agree to the price of 18,000 Euros.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, thank you for your offer. I am happy to accept the rental price of 18,000 Euros per month for a one-year lease. Please let me know if you have any additional questions or if there is anything else I can assist you with.
name: Heinrich Heine
